channel.title: [PI] Regicide Source
channel.description:
I downloaded the "Regicide" source from the server downloads section and I get this when I try to 'Run Game' is the run.bat basically.
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: org/regicide/ rs2/Server : Unsupported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(ClassLoader.java:631) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:615) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:14 1) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(URLClassLoader.java:283) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(URLClassLoader.java:58) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:197) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:247) Could not find the main class: org.regicide.rs2.Server. Program will exit. [/code]
Here is my 'Run Game': [code]@echo off title Regicide :run "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jdk1.6.0_31/bin/java.exe" -Xmx1024m -cp bin;data/lib/* org.regicide.rs2.Server goto run pause[/code]

item.title: [PI] Regicide Source
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“pray4urlife, post:2, topic:440376”]try erasing the (x86)[/quote]That’s not going to do anything.

Update your JDK.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Regicide Source
item.dc:creator: @Football1smylife Football1smylife
item.description:
@Football1smylife wrote:

I downloaded the “Regicide” source from the server downloads section and I get this when I try to ‘Run Game’ is the run.bat basically.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: org/regicide/ rs2/Server : Unsupported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(ClassLoader.java:631) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:615) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:14 1) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(URLClassLoader.java:283) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(URLClassLoader.java:58) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:197) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:247) Could not find the main class: org.regicide.rs2.Server. Program will exit.

Here is my ‘Run Game’:

@echo off title Regicide :run "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jdk1.6.0_31/bin/java.exe" -Xmx1024m -cp bin;data/lib/* org.regicide.rs2.Server goto run pause

Read full topic
